name: Lengsel
description: '''Lengsel''' was a [[progressive metal|progressive]] [[black metal]] band that formed in 1994 in Norway. They released one album, called ''[[Solace (Lengsel album)|Solace]]'', on Endtime Productions in 2000, which was subsequently licensed to [[Solid State Records]] for an American release. The second album ''[[The Kiss, the Hope]]'' was released in 2007. Their name means "longing" in [[Norwegian language|Norwegian]]; the idea of longing for home is a prominent theme on their debut release.
